The expert contacted Klobuchar: s campaign to verify the basis for her statement and received information from OpenSecrets, a website that tracks the number of lobbyists and lobbying spending.
OpenSecrets data showed that there were: 451 pharmaceutical/health products lobbyists in 2018, including lobbyists for medical device makers and over-the-counter health product producers.
The expert calculated that there are 2: 7 lobbyists per member of Congress when considering the broader pharmaceutical/health products industry, but only 1.5 lobbyists per member when considering only drugmakers.
